html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-05562007-04-19,  ,  HEALTH,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1158 - FOOD ADDITIVES) by allowing the use of calcium sulphate as a binding agent in a blend of prepared fish or meat as well as tragacanth gum as a stabilizing agent in anchovy sauce and by increasing the permitted level of use of sorbitol in a blend of prepared fish or meat.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0076 Publication Date: 2007-05-02
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1158 - FOOD ADDITIVES) by allowing the use of calcium sulphate as a binding agent in a blend of prepared fish or meat as well as tragacanth gum as a stabilizing agent in anchovy sauce and by increasing the permitted level of use of sorbitol in a blend of prepared fish or meat.
